com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.controller

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.controller.ElasticSearchController

  • public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all Elasticsearch commands necessary for Taskzilla Controller for packaging all the functions dealing with elastic search. Most common use will be with RequestManager
